Class PolicyComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.ai.brain.PolicyComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator

    public class PolicyComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator
    Compares the social/political leaning of the input policy (in a very naive manner).

      • isFavorable

        public boolean isFavorable(PolicyCard card)
        Determines whether or not the passed PolicyCard is favorable based on the political/social leaning of this PolicyComparator. Used by decision methods that do not make use of a PriorityQueue.
        Parameters:
        card - the card to assess the favorability of.
        Returns:
        true if the card is favorable, false otherwise.
